welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sherbrooke, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning architecture, vibrant arts scene, and picturesque natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sherbrooke has to offer.

restaurants.name: Antidote FoodLab
restaurants.description: Antidote FoodLab is a molecular gastronomy restaurant located in Sherbrooke.
restaurants.address: 35 Belvédère Nord, Suite 10 (Rue King OUest), Sherbrooke QC J1H 4A7

restaurants.name: Savoroso Café Gelato
restaurants.description: Savoroso Café Gelato is a café located in Sherbrooke.

restaurants.name: Auguste
restaurants.description: Auguste is a french restaurant located in Sherbrooke.

restaurants.name: Bistro Kàapeh Espresso
restaurants.description: Bistro Kàapeh Espresso is a café located in Sherbrooke.

restaurants.name: Les Vraies Richesses
restaurants.description: Les Vraies Richesses is a bakery located in Sherbrooke.
restaurants.address: 242 rue King O, Sherbrooke QC J1H 1P9

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sherbrooke Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sherbrooke Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
